name: Subhashree (Darlo) my soul mate ;)
greetingText: Wishing you the biggest slice of happy today.
wishText: Hope all your birthday wishes come true! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: On your birthday, I thought of giving you the cutest gift in the world.
replayText: But then I realized that is not possible because you yourself are the cutest gift in the world.
